_header: O sweet Jesu we knowledge this
Subjects: Christ, carols to; carols, to Christ
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to Christ — ten quatrains (aaab) with ‘Te deum laudamus’ refrain and burden: ‘Syng we alle þys tyme þus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O swete Ihesu we knowlege thisThatte thou art kyng of heuen
                    blis…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Sith we do trust only in theTe deum
                    laudamus

            1977: 206-7; 1977, 182-3.
